reviewText: I bought this movie because our original one had gotten ruined some how.  My two teens watched it when they were much younger and loved it, it was a favorite.  I've now got three more young children.. but the funny thing is, my 15 year old daughter is the one who wanted to buy it!  It's such a cute and sweet movie.

This is a wonderful movie! I love it! It was one of my favorite movies in elementary school. It's educational, has delightful characters, adorable animation, and catchy music. WHY WON'T THEY PUT SCAMPER ON DVD?!

5 stars to the spectacular, educational, animated feature the Adventures of Scamper the Penguin.  It is a movie the entire family will enjoy.  The true meaning of a penguins life comes through in the exhilarating musical score. It is a suspenseful story in which true friendship and love pull friends of all different sizes together to create one happy production.  We recommend this film to all families out there and hope they will enjoy it as much as we did and revisit Scamper and friends over and over again.
